description.value: You grew up learning to tinker with devices, repair objects, and take things apart. You're trained in Crafting. If you're trained in Crafting from another source (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Repair] an item without using a repair toolkit without taking the â€“2 circumstance penalty, improvising tools from whatever you have at hand. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to Repair an item when you have a repair toolkit.
